metadata.feature_description: Manages included and excluded file extensions for crawling and indexing operations.

steps.action: Navigate to Site Settings > Search > File Extensions
steps.expected: File Extensions page loads with included and excluded sections
steps.actual: File Extensions page loaded successfully showing included extensions (doc, docx, pdf, ppt, pptx, txt, xls, xlsx) and excluded extensions

steps.action: Click Add File Type button in Included File Extensions section
steps.expected: Add form appears with text input
steps.actual: Add form appeared with File Extension text input field
Validation error displayed - extension not in host whitelist
Validation error displayed - extension not in host whitelist
Validation error displayed - extension not in host whitelist

issues: Unable to add any new included extensions due to restrictive host whitelist - all tested extensions (htm, jpg, rtf) were rejected as not in whitelist

steps.action: Locate .xlsx extension in included list and click delete icon
steps.actual: Delete confirmation dialog appeared asking to confirm removal
Extension .xlsx successfully removed from the included list

steps.action: Click Add File Type button in Excluded File Extensions section
steps.expected: Add form appears with text input
steps.actual: Add form appeared with File Extension text input field
Validation error displayed - extension not in host whitelist

issues: Unable to add excluded extensions due to host whitelist validation - zip extension was rejected

steps.action: Locate .zip extension in excluded list and click delete icon
steps.actual: Delete confirmation dialog appeared asking to confirm removal
Extension .zip successfully removed from the excluded list

steps.action: Attempt to add 'htm' to included extensions
steps.expected: System should validate against host whitelist
steps.actual: Validation error shown - NotInWhitelist error displayed

steps.action: Attempt to add 'jpg' to included extensions
steps.expected: System should validate against host whitelist
steps.actual: Validation error shown - NotInWhitelist error displayed

steps.action: Attempt to add 'rtf' to included extensions
steps.expected: System should validate against host whitelist
steps.actual: Validation error shown - NotInWhitelist error displayed

steps.action: Attempt to add 'zip' to excluded extensions
steps.expected: System should validate against host whitelist
steps.actual: Validation error shown - NotInWhitelist error displayed

steps.action: Attempt to add 'css' to excluded extensions (css already exists in excluded list)
steps.expected: System should prevent duplicate and show error
steps.actual: Error displayed indicating duplicate extension cannot be added

steps.action: Open add extension form and clear the input field
steps.expected: Validation indicator should appear for empty field
steps.actual: Red border with exclamation mark appeared indicating required field validation
Save was blocked - form remained open with validation error

observations: The host whitelist appears to be very restrictive - common file extensions like htm, jpg, rtf, xlsx, and zip are all rejected as not in whitelist

Existing extensions in the system (doc, docx, pdf, ppt, pptx, txt, xls, xlsx for included; css, eot, htmtemplate, ico, rar, template, ttf, woff, xml, xsd, xsl, zip for excluded) were likely pre-configured or added when the whitelist was different
Code review confirms extensions are validated against Host.AllowedExtensionWhitelist before being added
Extensions are normalized to lowercase and leading dots are removed before processing
Both included and excluded extensions use the same whitelist validation logic
IFilter information is displayed for included extensions showing content crawling capability
The UI clearly indicates when content crawling is unavailable for certain extensions (pdf, pptx)
